tool_description: An API that provides information about various playing card brands.

api_list.name: getlist
api_list.description: Retrieve a complete list of playing card brands available in the database.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for a specific brand.

optional_parameters.name: logo_img
optional_parameters.description: URL of the brand's logo image.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The name of the brand to filter the results.
